name: Delta Force: Xtreme 2
description:
Delta Force: Xtreme 2 is an action-shooter game developed by NovaLogic. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by NovaLogic. Delta Force: Xtreme 2 has a Metascore of 40, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Delta Force: Xtreme 2 is available on PC.
